title: New York Times Media Group 's circulation revenue from Q1 2012 - Q4 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 32 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2012.
The highest Quarter Q4 2019 has 85.31 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Quarter Q1 2012.
